name: The Forever Victual
desc:
*BOOM*...
Outside the Maze, a storm rages endlessly.
*gurgle*...
The fairies' magical cauldron burns with an eternal flame.
"Sprinkle in the special spices..."
"Add some fresh vegetables!"
"This time, we'll succeed for sure!"
The huge cauldron bubbled up again as the fairies watched eagerly.
"Here it comes, here it comes!"
A brilliant light burst forth from the bottom of the pot...
Look, everyone's gathering around!
...
At the fragrant feast, guests raised their glasses to toast to these wonderful times...
May this dreamy paradise stay warm and joyful forever!
